Text.Page: <PCNAME> discovered that the devas had learned that Kantusa was a spy, and she barely escaped with her life. Kamia and <PCNAME> rescued Kantusa, but she died shortly after—but not before revealing that the devan raiders were in league with a group of cultists worshipping Lok. <PCNAME> killed Dakanius so that Kantusa wouldn't have died in vain.
Wait...do you hear that? It sounds like someone moaning...<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"It's coming from over there!"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

It's Kantusa! She's been captured!

The devas must've found out she's not one of them! We have to rescue her!

Let's go!

Thank you for coming, but it's too late. You can't save me. Get out of here...save yourself!

But listen: This is important: Dakanius...he's..."We're not leaving you behind!"

I won't make it out...out of Deva Silva. You have to...deliver my report.

Dakanius...he's in league...with cultists...

...cultists of Lok!"Are you sure? Tell me what happened."
{@linkcreature:3#7#Dakanius} must be...stopped. He was headed...north...of Deva Silva...<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Don't try to talk. We'll patch you up."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Don't waste...your time...

I'll just...slow you down.

You can't...let Dakanius...get away...

Promise me you'll stop him!

No...no...

She was my best friend. We've known each other since we were children."I'm so sorry, Kamia. She was very brave."

We have to kill Dakanius.

If you don't help me, I'll do it alone.

If even half of what Kantusa told us is accurate—if Dakanius is in league with the cult of Lok—he has to be stopped!

If we hurry, if we activate the Arcessolith and call Dakanius out of his stronghold, we'll take him by surprise.

Say you'll help me, ."You can count on me."

You did it, . Thank you.

Now Kantusa will be able to rest in peace...

What's that you found? Some kind of token?"Dakanius dropped it when he died."

This...this has the symbol of Lok on it!

Kantusa was right! The devas are in league with the cult of Lok...and this proves it!
